name: Spiritwalker

skills.name: Cripple
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Battle Trance
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs from this Champion. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
